documents.document: @Jaide_Alicia @warrantrocks Me also Jaide, I hope @bobbiejeanbrown is ok today. I'm about to play Warrant-Dfsr, Cherry pie and Dog eat dog!🎤
@purerocklive Really cool underrated Album in its time, and still crank it yearly to this day! 🎤🎸🎸
@ZuriHall Wonderful photo Zuri, legendary. Extremely looking forward to Fences and Hidden Figures releases here in Australia next few weeks📽
@AwardShowUpdate @ZuriHall cool Red Carpet shot Zuri, I hope you have a blast at the SAG Awards. Go Lion, Fences and LA LA Land!📽😊
@AnythingKISS @genesimmons Crazy Nights album era.
@nicktsimmons @genesimmons will go perfectly with his next product/project - the KISS Air Guitar Tablature book! 🎸
@PaulShortino @joelynnturner Wow, legendary stuff Paul and Joe - A true "We are not worthy!" moment mate! 🎤🎤🎸👍
@Jaide_Alicia Cool diversity in your Metal tastes Jaide. Personally, Keel are awesome and all Kreator's 80's stuff, especially Endless Pain🤘
@CrazyLixx Youbetcha, looking forward to the new Crazy Lixx Album here in Australia!🎤🎸👍
@ThisDayInMETAL @OfficialSkidRow @sebastianbach @sNAKEsABO @ScottiHill @rbolanbass Wow, what a kick-ass day that was, on first listen! 🎤🎸🤘
@xonecole @ZuriHall Awesome stuff Zuri and great inspiration!👌🏻😊
@AndreaNavedo So great you marched for women all around the world Andrea! Amazing scenes there. We even had marches here in Australia. 🙏🏼😊
@MsVivicaFox @HuffingtonPost So true Vivica, the absurd Trump craziness has begun already. We're in for a horribly wild ride for a while!😲🇺🇸
The Real Greatest Albums of the 80's. Classic Rock magazine new special issue. https://t.co/P5buIcwOfF
@BarackObama @ZuriHall Thank you for sharing Zuri. and President Obama, a sincere thank you from Australia for your great work and caring🇺🇸
@POTUS44 President Obama, a sincere, heartfelt thank you from Australia for all your great work and genuine caring for fellow human beings🇺🇸
@realDonaldTrump Congratulations President Trump. Change may start now, but please don't undo all of President Obama's heartfelt hard work🇺🇸
@POTUS A sincere Thank you from Australia for all your great accomplishments and leadership over the past 8 Years and beyond President Obama
@TheBulletBoys Really exciting news,looking forward to more huge hooks, killer vocals and big songs & sound/production of the glory days!🎤🎸👍
@sebastianbach Bas, just finished reading your new Book '18 & Life on Skid Row' and it Rocks. Some classic & hilarious stories!@Suzanne_Le🎤👍
@KaliHawk Hi Kali, with the New Release of 50 Shades Darker movie, hopefully you'll be working with the Wayan Bros on 50 Shades Blacker! 👊🏽😁
@FLOTUS No, Thank You, Michelle. Kind regards from Australia. 🇦🇺🇺🇸🙏🏼😊
@Itsanniechang Hey Annie, your face is going to be all over Australian TV Screens again as @nbcshadesofblue has just been Released on DVD!👍🙂
@Traceyeedmonds Hi Tracey watching your reporting on @extratv here in Australia now in the new year. Just saying Hi for the 1st time in '17!
@HereIsGina Hi Gina, saw #DeepwaterHorizon on New DVD Release today here in Australia. It gets even better second time around!@AndreaNavedo😊
@RightOnTV Most use of the F word. My 'little Friend!'
@AlGoreReport @WHAS11 God help the Free World, as Donald Trump has absolutely No idea what he is doing. Deep regrets for America.
@HairBandRadio Tyketto new album 'Faith' is great also. Getting back to their classic first Self-titled Album sound!
@Rosie @MsVivicaFox @thehill ...to see this Donald Trump wealthy fool undo all Barack and Michelle Obama's genuinely great work. Sad. 👎🇺🇸😔
@Rosie @MsVivicaFox @thehill How veryTrue. Barack & Michelle Obama have made such a wonderful contribution to the world, to have this...
@LeeAaronMusic Hi Lee, right there with you on this one, really cool to hear The Stones freshly covering Tracks from their Blues heroes! 👍:)
@SethMacFarlane Sincerely good news Seth. And now we already have the latest, greatest new Circus... that is the Donald Trump Presidency!😁
@ZuriHall Hi Zuri, too true. It should be a fair balance of give and take in an honest relationship. Hope you're having a lovely weekend!😊
@RealRaxxx sad I'm all the way over here in Sydney, Australia-otherwise I'd love to Book a meet & greet Rachel. Next time in the US!😊
@ZuriHall Wow that's cool Zuri, you got to see lots of memorable moments:the Meryl/Donald conflict and La La Land breaking Globes records! 😊
@AmaraCNN @cnntoday @holmescnn Hi Amara and Michael, great to see the A-Team of global News back together. Watching from here in Sydney! 🙂
@MandatoryMetal1 What a brilliant underrated true American Metal band. And can't beat the Leatherwolf triple axe attack!🎤🎸🎸🎸
@ZuriHall Hi Zuri, watching the Golden Globe Awards here in Sydney, Australia and think you look amazing. Hope you had a great night! 🍸😊
@kerrywashington Hi Kerry, watching the Golden Globes here in Sydney, Australia and think you look absolutely stunning on the Red Carpet.😊
@danspitz @ThisDayInMETAL @Anthrax They certainly have Dan. Have loved every Anthrax album since hearing Fistful the day it was Released!🎸👍😁
@musicmuso @EnuffZnuff @ChipZnuff Definitely way up there as one of the Top Albums of the Year for 2016. And best Enuff Z Nuff album in yrs👍
@Jaide_Alicia @Anthrax @MandatoryMetal1 Right with ya on this one Jaide. I love Among the Living and its legendary-but Fistful is killer!🎤🎸
@VANHALENhist0ry @DavidLeeRoth @VanHalen Absolutely awesome classic Diamond Dave shot. Van Halen history is off to a brilliant start to '17!
@VANHALENhist0ry @Kramer_5150 Wow, absolute killer classic Eddie shot. Hadn't seen this one before!🎸👍
@BLABBERMOUTHNET Sounds like it's gonna be a very cool new Album. Back to Classic down 'n' dirty Great White sound!🎤🎸👍@JacksGreatWhite
@RightOnTV Love CSI Miami but have only ever seen a couple of CSI Vegas Eps-Doh!🤔
@IndieWire Thank you for the most reliable and spot-on Oscar buzz Film predictions for the past 5 or more years.2017 is looking great also!📽
@LaLaLand Brilliant visual and musical feast. The freshest mix of contemporary and classic Hollywood in years. 👍📽⭐️@TheAcademy @IndieWire
@LaLaLand @RyanGosling @EmmaStoneWeb Brilliant visual and musical spectacle. Freshest mix of contemporary and classic Hollywood in years!👍📽
@AndreaNavedo Aww.. Thanks so much Andrea. You're the best! Have a great one!!👍😊
@RealRaxxx Gee Rachel, if you were ever over here in Sydney, I'd be putting down my deposit for you straight away!❤️😊
@CarrieStevensXO Hey Carrie, wishing you a Happy New Year from Oz, have a fun NYE and a Rocking 2017! Cheers.🎉🍻🎤🎸
@Hitomi_official Hitomi, wishing you a Happy New Year. I hope you have a wonderful 2017. Regards from Australia! David xoxo 🎉❤️🇦🇺🇯🇵🎉😊
@AmaraCNN Hi Amara, wishing you the Happiest New Year. I look forward to watching your reporting on CNN Today from here in Sydney in 2017!🎉😊
@holmescnn Gday Michael, wishing you a Happy New Year. Have a great one and look forward watching CNN Today from here in Sydney in 2017!👍
@AndreaNavedo Hey Andrea, wishing you the Happiest New Year. Have a wonderful year and look forward to seeing lots more of Xio in 2017! ❤️🎉
@Traceyeedmonds Hey Tracey, wishing you the Happiest New Year! Have an amazing year and see you on Extra TV in 2017. Lotsa love to you! xo😊🎉
@LeeAaronMusic Hey Lee, wishing a very Happy New Year to you, the one and only Metal Queen. Cheers from Australia and have a rocking 2017!🎤🎉
@deesnider Hey Dee, wishing you & family a Happy New Year and a great 2017! Thanks for the awesome new 'We are the ones' Album this year.🎤🎸🎉
@PaulShortino Thanks Paul, cheers mate. And hope to see you in Vegas in the near future Raiding The Rock Vault sometime!👍🎤🎸🎉
@PaulShortino Rock 'n' Roll is definitely stayin' then Paul, that's for sure! Wishing you a Happy New Year and all the best for 2017🎤🎸✌️️
@ZuriHall @TODAYshow Thanks so much Zuri, look forward to seeing more of your great Reports in '17!😊
@ZuriHall @TODAYshow Hi Zuri, wishing an amazing New Year in advance, from here in Sydney, Australia. I hope to tune-in to your Broadcast!🎉😊
@mcotillardoff Hi Marion, saw @AlliedMovie here in Sydney, Australia. Thought your Role was brilliant. I hope you're nominated for an Oscar📽
@PersonalBrad saw Allied here in Sydney, Australia today on Release and thought it was brilliant. Hope it's up for many an Oscar nominee.👍📽
#Filmoftheweek @AlliedMovie Casablanca for the modern day. Great Story, Cast, Screenwriting and Cinematography.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️📽@robertzemeckis
@Traceyeedmonds Hi Tracey, thank you so much.I hope you're enjoying a wonderful Christmas & holiday season. Warm regards from Sydney! David😊
@kaseykahne USA vs Australia, World Series Sprintcars at Sydney Raceway. https://t.co/z68D7KvjeO
@kaseykahne Hey Kasey, great to be here at #valvolineraceway Sydney, seeing you back again for USA vs Australia, World Series Sprintcars🇺🇸🇦🇺
@AndreaNavedo Thank you Andrea, happy holidays! :)
@davidcoverdale Wishing you, family & friends a very Merry one and thanks for all the brilliant Music. Cheers from Australia!🎸🎄
@HcssOfficial Merry Christmas from Australia to Hardcore Superstar. Now Cranking your Debut Album on Christmas Eve!… https://t.co/Opko2y838w
@holmescnn wishing you a Merry Christmas from here in Sydney-glad you made it back from Mosul in one piece mate & have a good Holiday break!
@NealSchonMusic Merry Christmas Neal. So stoked for you and Journey's induction into the Rock n Roll Hall of Fame.… https://t.co/NaA6TXFGGz
@Traceyeedmonds Hi Tracey, wishing you and your family a very Merry Christmas. I hope you have a fun and Happy Holidays! Love, David ❤️😊🎄
@AndreaNavedo Hi Andrea, wishing you and your family a very Merry Christmas. I hope you have a safe and Happy Holiday! Warm regards, David😊🎄
@LeeAaronMusic Hi Lee, wishing you a very Merry Christmas. Thanks for the great new Album this year. Have a rockin' and Happy Holidays!🎤🎸😊🎄
@JimmyKimmelLive Classic stuff Jimmy and thanks for the Christmas fun. Wishing you a Merry one and Cheers from Australia!🎄
@PaulShortino @Rock_Vault @HardRockHotelLV Wishing you a Merry Christmas from Australia Paul. Have a Rockin' one, cheers mate!🎤🎸🎄
Now watching @lovethecoopers Best Christmas film since #deckthehalls back in 2005!👍🎄
@deesnider Hey Dee, wishing you and your family a very Merry Christmas from Australia. Will be playing a few Twisted Christmas tracks here!🎄
@mattsorum Classic comment and great stuff. Maybe playing cool Music is the answer! Merry Christmas Matt and thanks for the great Albums!🎄👍
@CarrieStevensXO Hi Carrie, wishing you a very Merry and rocking Christmas. Hope Santa brings you some great Albums! Love, David xo 🎤🎸🎁🎄
@AmaraCNN Hi Amara, Wishing you, my favourite News Anchor, a very Merry Christmas. I hope you have a lovely holiday break! Regards.😊🎄
@EddieTrunk @Mrjimflorentine @realdonjamieson @DingbatzNJ Cool stuff Eddie, will be tuning in from here in Australia!👍
@EddieTrunk @BBCWorld That's horrible news Eddie. I've religiously bought each Classic Rock magazine issue here in Australia since Issue #1
She is #theperfectlie https://t.co/RsTKFZP8UY
@NealSchonMusic wow, very cool Rolling Stone article Neal🎸
@realdonjamieson @EddieTrunk @siriusxmvolume Great, will do. Thanks Don, and look forward to listening!🎸👍
@NealSchonMusic Hi Neal, I reckon: 1. Faithfully 2. Lights 3. Don't stop believin' Cheers mate🎸
@stevesmithdrums @JourneyOfficial @clevelanddotcom Awesome News guys, brilliant stuff!@NealSchonMusic
@TheVidSpot @EagletonSucks What, you mean I now don't have to count every skip myself anymore? Will be able to stop lots less to jot down!😁
@MetalNation247 Now that's an old school Classic most people wouldn't remember... or even know about. One for only the True Metalheads!🎸🎤🤘
She is #theperfectlie https://t.co/XjP3oufw8X
@realDonaldTrump You'll be letting China get away with yet more blatant stealing.They'll copy any of the Drone tech they don't already have.
@realDonaldTrump I remember that great phrase: Made in the USA. Way better quality than anything ever 'Made in Taiwan'.🇺🇸👍
@oliviamunn Hi Olivia, just saw #OfficeChristmasParty here in Australia and loved it-2 great roles for you this year with Ride Along2 also!🎄
@EddieTrunk ..and if you count Sixx AM as one Album, then Anthrax-For all Kings is way up there too!@realdonjamieson https://t.co/rQbZeFJFIX
@NikkiSixx my Top 10 Albums of the year. Sixx AM-Prayers for the damned and blessed are both Number 1&2.@SixxAM 🎤🎸👍 https://t.co/biRQxBQgvJ
@deesnider my Top 10 fave Albums of the year. Dee Snider-'We are the ones' is right up there with the Best!🎤🎸🇺🇸👍 https://t.co/o7foaScXtd
